Title: The Twilight Samurai
Writer: Shûhei Fujisawa (novels), Yôji Yamada (screenplay), Yoshitaka Asama (screenplay)
Actors: Hiroyuki Sanada, Rie Miyazawa, Nenji Kobayashi, Ren Osugi
Plot: As the feudal Japan era draws to a close, a widower samurai experiences difficulty balancing 2 young daughters, an aged mother, clan loyalties, and the sudden reappearance of his childhood sweetheart.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 37 wins & 7 nominations.
